Title: The Master of Their Craft
Description:
While I was traveling through these plains, I met an old centaur in a cave up north. They had clearly mastered their craft and had wisdom to spare.

They helped me understand the knowledge I had gained from the Dragon Isles.

If you're curious about specializing in your profession, seek out the wisdom of this master. Khadin was their name, of Clan Teerai.
ObjectivesText: Seek out Master Khadin to learn their professional wisdom.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Khadin in Khadin's Cave.
RewardText: If you truly seek my knowledge, you must prove yourself worthy of it.
